channel.title: Playing files in a row without pause fails
channel.description: Hi there to solve my issue of uploading files > 8Mb I divided my files in chunks. Now I'd like to play them without interruption if possible. So I use a bunch of "wave / play stereo fn" daisychained together. I thought I could coonnect the END output to trigger the START inlet of the next object but it doens't work. For some reason they all trigger at startup. I thought maybe I should use a comparator to check for 1 value so I used math == without succes. Any help? Is there a way to debug? Visualize the values in the patches? Thanks A

item.title: Playing files in a row without pause fails
item.dc:creator: @jestern Alberto
item.description:
@jestern wrote:

Hi there to solve my issue of uploading files > 8Mb I divided my files in chunks. Now I'd like to play them without interruption if possible. So I use a bunch of "wave / play stereo fn" daisychained together.
I thought I could coonnect the END output to trigger the START inlet of the next object but it doens't work. For some reason they all trigger at startup. I thought maybe I should use a comparator to check for 1 value so I used math == without succes. Any help? Is there a way to debug? Visualize the values in the patches? Thanks
A

Read full topic
item.source: Playing files in a row without pause fails
